thr0w.Grid Class

Defined in: /home/sckmkny/Documents/apps/larkintuckerllc-ds-example/bower_components/thr0w-client/js/thr0w-base.js:508
Module: thr0w-base

This class is used to create grids.

Constructor

thr0w.Grid

(
  • frameEl
  • contentEl
  • matrix
)

Defined in /home/sckmkny/Documents/apps/larkintuckerllc-ds-example/bower_components/thr0w-client/js/thr0w-base.js:508

Parameters:

  • frameEl Object

    The frame DOM element.

  • contentEl Object

    The content DOM element.

  • matrix Array

    An array of arrays of integers defining the channels for the grid; an array of a single empty array for single screen.
